posts.title: DISCORD!!!!
posts.content: There's a Discord now! Find it here!

posts.title: I'm still alive
posts.content: Well I haven't put anything here in forever, but I though I'd just put something here to prove I'm still alive. Only issue is that I never finish projects...

posts.title: Yay! Projects!
posts.content: The first project is up! Head to the projects page to have a look.

posts.title: Happy New Year!
posts.content: It's now 2020! And that's literally all I wanted to say.

posts.title: SOSC is a thing now!
posts.content: Saviours of the Sword Coast has begun! There should be a recap <abbr title="SOSC recaps are not currently available."><del>here</del></abbr>

posts.title: Hello!
posts.content:
I've done it! Finally! A website to host projects! It may or may not have taken me four/five years, but I did it! Finally!
My idea is that I can use this site to show off host my projects, and they and their source code (hopefully) can be downloaded via a link I will hopefully remember to provide for each one.
